opportunity.name: Visit the zoo
opportunity.shortDescription: Learn about animals than by coming face-to-face with them. Talk to the zookeepers to find out even more!
opportunity.longDescription: Learn about animals than by coming face-to-face with them. Talk to the zookeepers to find out even more!

opportunity.name: Join the Scouts
opportunity.shortDescription: Scouting is a great way to learn life skills, make lifelong friends, and get out there and explore your world.
opportunity.longDescription: Scouting is a great way to learn life skills, make lifelong friends, and get out there and explore your world.

opportunity.name: Become a birdwatcher
opportunity.shortDescription: Check out the amazing variety of feathered species right in your area! Grab binoculars and a birding guide, and get going.
opportunity.longDescription: Check out the amazing variety of feathered species right in your area! Grab binoculars and a birding guide, and get going.

opportunity.name: Join the Minecraft Club
opportunity.shortDescription: Building whatever you imagine with virtual blocks means having fun while boosting STEM skills.
opportunity.longDescription: Building whatever you imagine with virtual blocks means having fun while boosting STEM skills.

opportunity.name: Go to an amusement park
opportunity.shortDescription: How does a roller coaster work, anyway? Enjoy the thrills—then take a closer look at the structure of the rides!
opportunity.longDescription: How does a roller coaster work, anyway? Enjoy the thrills—then take a closer look at the structure of the rides!

opportunity.name: Go inline skating
opportunity.shortDescription: Enjoy fun and fresh air while keeping steady and safe.
opportunity.longDescription: Enjoy fun and fresh air while keeping steady and safe.
